attributes.action: Ban body-shaming and bullying in magazines and newspapers
attributes.background: I have seen so many celebrity body-shaming and bullying in magazines and newspapers. Teenagers are reading it. It can affect their state of mental health especially, including using 'photoshop' photos, 'perfect' bodies. This is the only way it'll stop.
attributes.additional_details: Most recent is Stacey Solomon was on front of Now Magazine with headline 'boring' 'desperate' 'cheap' and why fans are sick of her because they saw a couple comments about her continuous positivity on body confidence, and next there was another story about revenge bodies, and it's wrong to do this, and there should be a ban on body-shaming, bullying in magazines, and should focusing on celebrating your body, and be confident in your skin, and what you look like.

attributes.action: Increase the standard fine and points for driving in closed motorway lanes.
attributes.background: Despite radio ads, we still often see drivers waiting til the very last second to move out of closed lanes with a red X, often passing through a mile or so of warnings. Those caught in the accident and the police/ambulance service are put at risk by the idiocy of people in a hurry.
attributes.additional_details:
The current fines are either not charged, or aren't an adequate deterrent for vehicle users to not use them. Suggested alternatives - as the Highways Authority are informed of where an accident may be and which lanes to close, suggest turning on any cameras available to catch people. The cameras only need be turned on when the lane is closed.

If caught, increase the fine to £150 and 6 penalty points. Alternatively, for each gantry driven through with a red X give them the standard fine.

attributes.action: Create an ombudsman for the travel industry
attributes.background: At the moment when a person has a complaint regarding the travel industry the only person they can complain to is the travel member or ABTA. If there was an ombudsman appointed then the customer would stand a better chance of being helped by someone who is independent.

attributes.action: Mental health checkups should be completed yearly from a young age on the NHS
attributes.background: Mental health checkups through the NHS should be followed out just as physical health checks are done yearly from a young age.

attributes.action: Keep the tornado in a flying order
attributes.background: The Panavia  tornado has been flying for many years for the golf war and has saved many lives so at least we can do is give a preservation of flying order to it this means to keep it in flying so it won't be scrapped and forgot we have done the same for ww2 aircraft let's do it for the future
attributes.additional_details:
Gulf war - 1991
Kosovo war 
Bosnian war
Iraq war
Libyan Civil war

Also involved with 
Yemen
 afganistan
 Syria

attributes.action: Help fund the NHS so people can have (Otoplasty-Pinnaplasty) surgery.
attributes.background:
I would like to have cosmetic surgery as my ears stick out a bit,  I’ve been to my doctors and seen different doctors and they said I might not be accepted due to funding and not have a good case.

I suffer from Body Dysmorphic Disorder and severe depression, having  ears pinned would help a bit.
attributes.additional_details:
People who need and would like to have Otoplasty surgery can’t get it done due to NHS not funded enough. It costs too much going private and either myself and/or other people who want Otoplasty can’t afford it. It’s not right that myself or others would have to go private. The cost is about £2,500-£3,500 plus any consultations etc.

I want to get this done as it’s causimg me significant Psychological distress and others feel the same. I don’t want to go privately to get cosmetic surgery.

attributes.action: Provide Network Rail with funding for the second entrance at Putney Station
attributes.background:
Wandsworth Council have been pushing for a 2nd entrance to Putney Station for years, but have failed to secure funding.

This project would improve access between SWT and District Line and reduce congestion in the main entrance. Please back this project with government funding.
attributes.additional_details:
Wandsworth Council article showing the benefits to locals:
http://www.wandsworth.gov.uk/news/article/13181/rail_passengers_urged_to_quiz_rail_chiefs_on_new_station_entrance

Local Guardian article about the plans:
http://www.yourlocalguardian.co.uk/news/10636235.Train_bosses_urged_to_consider_second_entrance_plan_for_Putney_station/

Putney High Street is also one of the most polluted roads in London, so this project would have health benefits, as well as saving time for passengers.

attributes.action: Proscribe the Bangladesh Chhatra (Student) League
attributes.background: Members of the Bangladesh Chhatra (Student) League have been attacking people, including women, elderly, indigenous peoples, students.
attributes.additional_details:
We appeal for peace and justice and that is why we are reaching out to international community to find avenues to protect children of Bangladesh. We are seeking your help! To start with, Bangladesh Chhatra (Student) League needs to be recognized and proscribed by the UK as a terrorist organization.
 
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-45069935
 
http://www.foxnews.com/world/2018/08/04/police-protesters-clash-in-bangladesh-capital-many-injured.html”

attributes.action: To make the M5 north and south bond to 4/5 lanes wide from Exeter to Bristol.
attributes.background: The M5 north and south bond is one of the most congested motorways in the country and each week thousands of people are stuck in heavy traffic jams turning1 hour trips into 4 hours of stand still traffic. Extending each side to 4 or 5 lanes would increase the flow of traffic and decrease congestion.

attributes.action: Make using red flashing lights on recovery trucks mandatory.
attributes.background: In 2018 alone we have had some very tragic incidents on the roads that could of been prevented. A lack of concentration whilst driving at speed is killing innocent workers. More needs to be done to protect workers roadside. Hitting a stationary vehicle on the hard shoulder shouldn't happen.
attributes.additional_details:
Unlike blue flashing lights, amber lights grant no priority in traffic and are used to solely to emphasize a vehicle, often due to being a hazard. AKA non important
.Vehicles that use amber flashing lights include:

Road / highway maintenance vehicle 
Refuse collection vehicle
Breakdown recovery vehicle
the list goes on.

Most vehicles that do any kind of civil work have amber flashing lights, they are abused and misused, giving drivers the indication they are not important. This needs to change. All recovery trucks to have flashing reds fitted so motorist understand drivers need the room to operate. Workers to return home safe, not in a coffin.

attributes.action: UK Government should work with Dumfries and Galloway Council to house refugees
attributes.background: Many refugees live in awful horrible conditions and we do not. There is so much space here in Dumfries and Galloway and I want the refugees to have the same opportunities that we have.
attributes.additional_details: Countries close to war torn countries have begun to refuse letting in refugees. It is a selfish act to deprive others of the things we take for granted every day. Let refugees come here.

attributes.action: Declassify first class carriages on all rush hour trains
attributes.background: Given the rising cost of train travel, it’s utterly unacceptable that hard-working commuters aren’t guaranteed a seat. Declassifying first class carriages can at least alleviate the issue. It is archaic, and totally unjustifiable when commuters are literally falling over each other in standard class

attributes.action: Urge the Nigerian Government to release Sheikh Ibrahim Zakzaky from prison.
attributes.background:
Ibrahim Yaqoub El Zakzaky, is a Shia cleric who was arrested & imprisoned wrongfully in 2015  is still being detained despite the Federal High Court ordering his release on the 2nd of December 2016. 

As a result of his imprisonment, his health has deteriorated significantly.
attributes.additional_details:
Thousands of his supporters have been either arrested, abused and even killed for protesting and calling for his release. 

The conditions in which Sheikh Zakzaky has been in are inhumane, and something needs to be done urgently to assist him.

attributes.action: Reduce the number of days in a year a workers union can strike to 12 days a year
attributes.background: Over the last 12 months union strikes have disrupted public transport. At the moment operators like Northern have been striking every Saturday since October 2018. I would like to  introduce a cap of 12 days a year for unions to use for there strike days.

attributes.action: Raise the practical driving test standards considerably.
attributes.background: By raising the Practical Driving Test Standards we can expect to see only the safest drivers pass and the road fatalities fall. If the standards are raised considerably everyone including young drivers will enjoy a lower insurance premium and safer roads.
attributes.additional_details:
The average cost for a young driver under the age of 25 to obtain an insurance in 2018 is a whopping £1400!

https://www.moneysavingexpert.com/insurance/young-drivers/

Young drivers account for a quarter of road fatalities.

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/448039/young-car-drivers-2013-data.pdf

attributes.action: HGVs restricted to first two lanes of motorways & be restricted at peak times.
attributes.background: HGVs, vehicles above 7.5 tonnes, cause restricted traffic flow when overtaking on motorways during busy periods.  HGVs should be restricted to the 1st lane during peak hours, using overhead signage, and should not be able to enter the third lane on four lane motorways.
attributes.additional_details: These restrictions are already in place all over the European motorway network and help traffic flow.

attributes.action: Hold a General Election in April 2019.
attributes.background: The UK populace deserves to have a people’s vote, on which UK Party, will lead us into the future. After we leave the European Union. Give people a choice on what party will take over after 29th March 2019.
attributes.additional_details: I feel that the Conservative Party, should allow this. As they have made a bit of a catastrophe out of this whole Brexit ordeal. They owe us that much. Please allow an April 2019 - UK General Election.

attributes.action: Give under 18's free self-test STI kits
attributes.background: Self-test kits for STIs are also available online and on the high street. They include home testing kits for infections such as chlamydia and gonorrhoea that you can send away to a laboratory. This could be a huge help to the amount of people who are nervous or shy to go to such clinic to be tested.

attributes.action: Update food allergies laws to list allergens on menus in food establishments
attributes.background: In 2014, food allergies laws were passed for food establishments to tell customers if their food contains ingredients known to trigger allergies. It has recently become apparent staff don't always provide the correct information. An update is needed to make it compulsory for the info to be on menus

attributes.action: Remove 'Mrs' and 'Miss' on all government docs & forms and use only 'Ms' instead
attributes.background: Why is it that women designate their marital status when men don't? It's 2018, this indirect sexism shouldn't be supported by the UK government. 'Miss' and 'Mrs' have no place in this era of equality, let's have them replaced by one single designation 'Ms'; just like 'Mr' and the now disused 'Mstr'.

attributes.action: Renegotiate the Brexit deal immediately in the event MPs vote against it
attributes.background: If MPs vote against the Brexit deal, the Government shall immediatley seek to negotiate an improved deal, including ensuring the U.K. will have a unilateral right to leave the customs union in the event of a backstop scenario thereby honouring the leave vote and working to avoid a “no deal” scenario
attributes.additional_details: The referendum vote to leave is compromised by the inability of the U.K. to unilaterally leave the customs union in the event of a backstop scenario. In the highly likely event MPs vote against the deal the Government must commit to return to the EU to negotiate an improved deal, for example to amend the Withdrawal Agreement to create a unilateral right to leave the customs union in the event of a backstop scenario and to reduce the Brexit bill; to be done immediatley and urgently after the vote

attributes.action: Individuals should pay half the amount of tax on overtime.
attributes.background:
In order to better your financial position and that of your family you should be able to pay only half the amount of tax on any hours worked as overtime compared to what you work as normal hours. 
This arrangement would encourage people into work and boost production and productivity for employers.

attributes.action: Simplify planning use classes by combine A1, A2, B1 and D1.
attributes.background: Planning requires change of use, which is expensive.  This is just red-tape.  Many categories overlaps.

attributes.action: Make it a law in the Porn industry all STD’s to be on sexual health certificates
attributes.background: I have worked in the Porn industry for the past 3 years and believe that sexual health is very important. On a sexual health certificate that we provide for Porn companies and performers in order to be able to work I believe should include every sexually transmitted infection instead of just some!
attributes.additional_details: In the Porn industry we are required to be tested every 28 days and have to provide a sexual health screening certificate to Porn companies and other performers in order to be able to work, how ever on the current certificates Porn companies and performers do not require all STD’s to be present on the certificate therefore people are still at risk of catching infections such as: Trichomoiasis, Herpes, Mycoplasma Genitalium and more! This is a big concern and I believe this should be a law.
